title: Ordered pair theorem for nonnegative integers

blocks.name: nn0le2msqi
blocks.content: The square function on nonnegative integers is monotonic. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 10-Dec-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0le2msqi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c0, cmul, c0), cle, co(c1, cmul, c1)))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, cn0)
} = {
  bitri(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c0, cmul, c0), cle, co(c1, cmul, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cle, co(c1, cexp, nat2)))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cle, co(c1, cexp, nat2))), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  nn0ge0i(c0)
  nn0ge0i(c1)
  le2sqi(c0, c1)
  nn0rei(c0)
  nn0rei(c1)
  breq12i(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cle, co(c1, cexp, nat2), co(c0, cmul, c0), co(c1, cmul, c1))
  sqvali(c0)
  nn0cni(c0)
  sqvali(c1)
  nn0cni(c1)
}

blocks.name: nn0opthlem1
blocks.content: A rather pretty lemma for ~ nn0opthi . (Contributed by Raph Levien, 10-Dec-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0opthlem1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), clt, co(c1, cmul, c1)))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, cn0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), clt, co(c1, cmul, c1)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cle, co(c1, cmul, c1)))
  nn0le2msqi(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)
  nn0addcli(c0, nat1)
  1nn0()
  mp2an(wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1)), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0))
  nn0ltp1le(c0, c1)
  bitr4i(wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), clt, co(c1, cmul, c1)), wbr(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cle, co(c1, cmul, c1)), wbr(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), caddc, nat1), cle, co(c1, cmul, c1)))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), clt, co(c1, cmul, c1)), wbr(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), caddc, nat1), cle, co(c1, cmul, c1))), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), cn0), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c1), cn0))
  nn0addcli(co(c0, cmul, c0), co(nat2, cmul, c0))
  nn0mulcli(c0, c0)
  nn0mulcli(nat2, c0)
  2nn0()
  nn0mulcli(c1, c1)
  nn0ltp1le(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), co(c1, cmul, c1))
  breq1i(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cle, co(c1, cmul, c1), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), caddc, nat1))
  eqtri(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), caddc, nat1), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, nat1))), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)))
  3eqtr3i(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, nat1))), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cexp, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, nat1))), caddc, co(nat1, cexp, nat2)))
  binom2i(c0, nat1)
  sqvali(co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  addcli(c0, nat1)
  oveq12i(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, nat1))), caddc, co(nat1, cexp, nat2), co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, nat1))), co(nat1, cmul, nat1))
  oveq1i(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, nat1)), co(c0, cmul, c0))
  sqvali(c0)
  sqvali(nat1)
  oveq12i(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, nat1))), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, nat1), co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), nat1)
  oveq2i(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, nat1)), co(nat2, cmul, c0))
  oveq2i(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, nat1), c0)
  mulid1i(c0)
  nn0cni(c0)
  mulid1i(nat1)
  ax-1cn()
}

blocks.name: nn0opthlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ nn0opthi . (Contributed by Raph Levien, 10-Dec-2002.) (Revised by Scott Fenton, 8-Sep-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0opthlem2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2), wne(co(co(c2, cmul, c2), caddc, c3), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1)))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, cn0)
  -| wcel(c2, cn0)
  -| wcel(c3, cn0)
} = {
  3syl(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2), wne(co(co(c2, cmul, c2), caddc, c3), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1)), wbr(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, cmul, c2)), wbr(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), clt, co(co(c2, cmul, c2), caddc, c3)))
  sylbi(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2), wbr(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, cmul, c2)), wbr(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1))), clt, co(c2, cmul, c2)))
  nn0opthlem1(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2)
  mpan(wbr(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1))), clt, co(c2, cmul, c2)), wbr(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, cmul, c2)), wbr(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), cle, co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)))))
  ax-mp(wbr(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), cle, co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)))), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
  nn0addge2i(c1, c0)
  sylib(wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), cle, co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)))), wbr(c1, cle, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1))))
  nn0lele2xi(c1, co(c0, caddc, c1))
  leadd2i(c1, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
  lelttri(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1))), co(c2, cmul, c2))
  readdcli(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
  remulcli(nat2, co(c0, caddc, c1))
  2re()
  mpan2(wbr(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, cmul, c2)), wbr(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), clt, co(co(c2, cmul, c2), caddc, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c2), cle, co(co(c2, cmul, c2), caddc, c3)))
  nn0addge1i(co(c2, cmul, c2), c3)
  ltletri(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(c2, cmul, c2), co(co(c2, cmul, c2), caddc, c3))
  ltnei(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(c2, cmul, c2), caddc, c3))
  readdcli(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), c1)
  remulcli(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, caddc, c1))
  nn0rei(co(c0, caddc, c1))
  nn0addcli(c0, c1)
  nn0rei(c1)
  readdcli(co(c2, cmul, c2), c3)
  remulcli(c2, c2)
  nn0rei(c2)
  nn0rei(c3)
}

blocks.name: nn0opthi
blocks.content: An ordered pair theorem for nonnegative integers. Theorem 17.3 of [Quine] p. 124. We can represent an ordered pair of nonnegative integers ` A ` and ` B ` by ` ( ( ( A + B ) x. ( A + B ) ) + B ) ` . If two such ordered pairs are equal, their first elements are equal and their second elements are equal. Contrast this ordered pair representation with the standard one ~ df-op that works for any set. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 10-Dec-2002.) (Proof shortened by Scott Fenton, 8-Sep-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0opthi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, cn0)
  -| wcel(c2, cn0)
  -| wcel(c3, cn0)
} = {
  impbii(wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  jca(wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))
  sylib(wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c3), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)))
  oveq2d(c2, caddc, c1, c3, wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)))
  addcan2i(c0, c1, c2)
  nn0cni(c0)
  nn0cni(c2)
  sylib(wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c3)))
  eqtr4d(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c3), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)))
  id(wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c3, co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)))
  oveq12d(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c3), co(c2, caddc, c3), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)))
  necon4i(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3), co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c3))
  sylbi(wne(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c3)), wne(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)), wo(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c3)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c3), clt, co(c0, caddc, c1))))
  lttri2i(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c3))
  nn0rei(co(c0, caddc, c1))
  nn0rei(co(c2, caddc, c3))
  jaoi(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c3)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c3), clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wne(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)))
  necomd(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c3)))
  nn0opthlem2(c0, c1, co(c2, caddc, c3), c3)
  nn0addcli(c2, c3)
  nn0opthlem2(c2, c3, co(c0, caddc, c1), c1)
  addcani(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), c1, c3)
  mulcli(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, caddc, c1))
  nn0cni(co(c0, caddc, c1))
  nn0addcli(c0, c1)
  nn0cni(c1)
  nn0cni(c3)
  oveq12d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1, co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), c3, wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  oveq12d(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c3), co(c2, caddc, c3), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  oveq12(c0, c2, c1, c3, caddc)
  simpr(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))
}

blocks.name: nn0opth2i
blocks.content: An ordered pair theorem for nonnegative integers. Theorem 17.3 of [Quine] p. 124. See comments for ~ nn0opthi . (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0opth2i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cexp, nat2), caddc, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, cn0)
  -| wcel(c2, cn0)
  -| wcel(c3, cn0)
} = {
  bitri(wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cexp, nat2), caddc, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3)))
  eqeq12i(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cexp, nat2), caddc, c3), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), caddc, c3))
  oveq1i(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, c1, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
  sqvali(co(c0, caddc, c1))
  addcli(c0, c1)
  nn0cni(c0)
  nn0cni(c1)
  oveq1i(co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cexp, nat2), caddc, c3, co(co(c2, caddc, c3), cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)))
  sqvali(co(c2, caddc, c3))
  addcli(c2, c3)
  nn0cni(c2)
  nn0cni(c3)
  nn0opthi(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: nn0opth2
blocks.content: An ordered pair theorem for nonnegative integers. Theorem 17.3 of [Quine] p. 124. See ~ nn0opthi . (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0opth2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
